alert.note: Alert for Brookings; Lake; Minnehaha; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued October 23 at 7:08PM MDT until October 23 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 552 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN IOWA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST IOWA CHEROKEE CLAY DICKINSON LYON O`BRIEN OSCEOLA SIOUX IN MINNESOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MINNESOTA COTTONWOOD JACKSON LINCOLN LYON MURRAY NOBLES PIPESTONE ROCK IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA BROOKINGS LAKE MOODY IN SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA MINNEHAHA THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ARNOLDS PARK, BROOKINGS, CHEROKEE, FLANDREAU, FULDA, GEORGE, HARTLEY, HAWARDEN, HENDRICKS, HULL, INWOOD, IVANHOE, JACKSON, LAKE BENTON, LAKEFIELD, LARCHWOOD, LUVERNE, MADISON, MARSHALL, MILFORD, MOUNTAIN LAKE, ORANGE CITY, ORLAND, PIPESTONE, ROCK RAPIDS, ROCK VALLEY, SANBORN, SHELDON, SIBLEY, SIOUX CENTER, SIOUX FALLS, SLAYTON, SPENCER, SPIRIT LAKE, TYLER, WINDOM, AND WORTHINGTON.
